page.title: 02HEALTH IN BURSCOUGH
page.content: Burscough Health Centre has 7 Doctors and 47 other staff,including:A Speech- Therapist,Dietician,Audiologist,Dentist Chiropodist,Nurse,Health Visitors and administrative staff. A Doctor has 2750 patients and about 40 patients per.day.Approx.80 people visit the Centre daily. The most common illnesses are: 0-5 :colds,diarea and sickness 6-10:infectios diseases 11-16:colds adult:heart disease One of the most important clinics run at the Centre is the Baby Clinic for babies from birth onwards this monitors the health and development of the babies and ensures regular progress and imunisation. There is also one private Chiropodist and 2 Dental Practitioners and a Dental Mechanic.
